body_html:
Thank you. Sure I will give it a try. How do I disable complex instantiation? Is that one of the options when generating solution and project files with cmake?

Below is the command I was using

cmake .. -A x64 -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release ^
-DSWIG_EXECUTABLE=C:/work/tools/swigwin-3.0.12/swig.exe ^
-DPYTHON_EXECUTABLE=C:/Anaconda3/envs/python35/python.exe ^
-DPYTHON_LIBRARIES=C:/Anaconda3/envs/python35/libs/python35.lib ^
-Dtensorflow_ENABLE_GPU=ON ^
-DCUDNN_HOME="C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\cudnn5" ^
-Dtensorflow_WIN_CPU_SIMD_OPTIONS=/arch:AVX

body:
Thank you. Sure I will give it a try. How do I disable complex instantiation? Is that one of the options when generating solution and project files with cmake?

Below is the command I was using

```
cmake .. -A x64 -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release ^
-DSWIG_EXECUTABLE=C:/work/tools/swigwin-3.0.12/swig.exe ^
-DPYTHON_EXECUTABLE=C:/Anaconda3/envs/python35/python.exe ^
-DPYTHON_LIBRARIES=C:/Anaconda3/envs/python35/libs/python35.lib ^
-Dtensorflow_ENABLE_GPU=ON ^
-DCUDNN_HOME="C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\cudnn5" ^
-Dtensorflow_WIN_CPU_SIMD_OPTIONS=/arch:AVX
```
